subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Women and Girls
Muslims and Islam
Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
lead_paragraph: As the London Games approach, mixed messages are being sent about women, some by women themselves, having more to do with how they will look and behave than how they will perform.
snippet: As the London Games approach, mixed messages are being sent about women, some by women themselves, having more to do with how they will look and behave than how they will perform.
